name: Altice USA, Inc.
description: Altice USA, Inc. is a leading telecommunications and media company that provides broadband, video, and telecommunications services to residential and business customers across the United States. Founded in 2016 as a subsidiary of Altice N.V., the company operates under the Optimum and Suddenlink brands. Altice USA is committed to delivering high-quality, innovative services that enhance the customer experience and meet the evolving demands of the digital age. Through its robust fiber and cable networks, Altice offers a range of products including high-speed internet, digital television, and voice services, as well as advertising solutions and content. The company also invests in advanced technology and infrastructure to improve service delivery and customer satisfaction. Altice USA's mission is to empower its customers with the best connectivity and entertainment options while maintaining a strong focus on community engagement and corporate responsibility.
headquarters: Long Island City, New York, USA

faq.answer: Dexter Goei is the CEO of Altice USA, Inc.

faq.answer: Altice USA is headquartered in Long Island City, New York, USA.

faq.answer: Altice USA operates under the Optimum and Suddenlink brands.
